health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions about uncontrolled gambling within the villages by the Chinese.
health_data_challenges: Licensing of casinos under National government while County governments have no impact on them, school children being lured into gambling machines, unlicensed kiosks with gambling machines, expired licenses for gambling machine companies.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: 1) Companies to return gambling machines by a certain date. 2) Inspection and confiscation of machines after the set date. 3) Updates to be provided on the outcome by a specified date.
health_sector_decisions: Temporary suspension of uncontrolled gambling to reevaluate the placement and regulations of gambling machines.
health_evidence_base: Committee findings on the prevalence of gambling machines in the county, impact on school children, and licensing issues.
